Package com.percussion.services.filter

Interface Summary
IPSFilterItem Represents an item to be filtered.
IPSFilterService The filter services manages item filters and applies the item filters to lists of content ids.
IPSFilterServiceErrors Provides error codes for messages located in PSFilterErrorStringBundle
IPSItemFilter Filters narrow lists of content items down for use in content lists and slot content finders.
IPSItemFilterRule A filter rule defines a single criteria that may be used in an item filter.
IPSItemFilterRuleDef A rule def associates a specific filter rule (stored by the extensions manager) with a set of parameters to be used with it.
 

Class Summary
PSFilterServiceLocator Locator for the filter service
 

Exception Summary
PSFilterException Exception for problems in filter rules
